about_the_game:
Follow us as you open the magic book of fantasy and experience the world of thousands! You are a curious beginner who needs to keep improving your eyesight to find the laws of the world and feel the transformation of time and space. "Where wh..?" ("何处") is a LowPoly art style puzzle game, only this time, in a 3D world, embark on an adventure to find and explore, enjoy the beautiful graphics and melodious music. It's perfect for a quiet solo game, but of course it's even more fun when family and friends join in the fun! With nearly 100 levels and well over 10 hours of gameplay, there's plenty to go around!(￣︶￣)↗

Such a beautiful world

"Where wh..?" has nine main worlds, each with a completely different style of scenery, covering a variety of sci-fi, nature, humanities, history and culture. There is no monotonous and repetitive stacking of resources, only exquisite and rational design, perfectly integrated into the scene of the puzzles and fit the atmosphere of the soundtrack.♪(´∇`*)

Classical and innovative at the same time, back to the essence of the game

Traditional stubble hunting works are simply clicking differently in two images, "Where wh..?" draws on the advantages of a large number of similar works, not simply zoom in and out of the screen, but by simultaneously changing the view distance and distance to bring a different experience, for the first time incorporating the concept of time and space, a variety of shooting perspectives and transitions, and a new creative way to play, and no longer a simple copy-and-paste.o(￣ヘ￣o＃)

Colorful Journey

If it's just the same scenes and repetitive gameplay, it will definitely feel not not that interesting. "Where wh..?" has different gameplay and various dimensionally different scenes in the flow to make the playing experience more colorful, plus a smooth playing experience complete with collecting props and various achievements hidden in the scenes. Believe me! You will definitely find a lot of fun when you quietly devote yourself to it!(。・∀・)ノ

Comprehensive personalization

We've added a lot of personalization options in the settings, which can be adjusted at any time by opening the settings in order to play in a fun and comfortable way. Secretly, turning on windowed mode can further enhance the gaming experience with a 2:1 widescreen image that opens up the view enough to make it immersive!ヽ(￣ω￣(￣ω￣〃)ゝ

Challenging the boundaries of the eye

Any player who wants to delve into the fun of puzzle-finding can be truly satisfied in "Where wh..?". "Echo Mode" is designed as a high level of difficulty unlocked mid-game, with all hints removed, new resources to collect, and fully renovated scenes to challenge all your visual nerves!(￣△￣；)

About Us

"Where wh..?"is the second title from PitaGame, a two-person indie studio from Shanghai dedicated to making unique titles in the same genre. We hope you'll enjoy the demo, which will be up soon!

For more and more interesting games~ Follow us! The third installment will be coming soon!~
